name: LIP! Lewd Idol Project Vol. 2 - Hot Springs and Beach Episodes
name_original: LIP! Lewd Idol Project Vol. 2 - Hot Springs and Beach Episodes
description:
The ultimate fanservice experience is here!

A 2-in-1 yuri lewd adventure for the cultured people!

Are you ready for it?
Important: This release contains two fanservice episodes that complement the main story of LIP! Lewd Idol Project and take place during Vol. 2 itself. Both of them can be played without any previous knowledge of the series, but be sure to also check the main story for the complete experience!



LIP! Lewd Idol Project is a yuri Visual Novel series about a girl's adventure to becoming an Akihabara Lewd Idol!

Join Kairi in her adventure and explore the city, meet new girls, and try to form a group overcoming all the odds while having a lot of girl-on-girl action!

Make sure to grab our Lewd Idol Project Bundle with special discounts if you don’t own the previous installments!



After Kairi and Ranko convince the mysterious gamer girl Yuki to join the ranks of this peculiar idol project, two new relaxing trips are coming up next for our girls... It's time to take Yuki-chan out to the hot springs and the beach!

But it seems that our smart silver haired girl has some untraditional plans and some VR headsets for a unique visit to the hot springs... What is she planning to do in order to get herself alone with Kairi-chan this time?

Yuki-chan has never been to the beach before and she doesn't seem to want to start doing it now... Will Kairi-chan take her role as the group leader and be able to get her to overcome the fears and insecurities with the sun and the sea?

Discover all this and MUCH MORE in these two unforgettable days of vacation of Lewd Idol Project loaded with the most fun, unexpected, and hot moments of this trio of beautiful girls!

Don’t miss it!











  • High quality anime-style artwork
  • Fully uncensored yuri 18+ CGs
  • Multiple Endings
  • Relationship Meter between the girls
  • Unlockable CG Gallery to view erotic scenes
  • Wardrobe Mode with many alternative costumes to unlock
  • Photo Mode
  • Jukebox Mode
  • Partial Japanese voice acting


Hot Springs or Beach? Which one are you gonna play first?


Unlock and enjoy both wholesome and erotic yuri CG scenes in Gallery Mode!


Kairi, Yuki and Ranko will have unlockable sets of sexy swimsuits, yukata, and towels to enjoy.

Play both episodes and get them all!


After getting a new costume, you'll get unlimited access to them in Wardrobe Mode.

Try to unlock them all!


Our heroines will have a relationship meter that will increase or decrease each time you take an action or dialogue decision while interacting with each other.

Build your meters up to 100% and unlock extra scenes, dialogues, and endings!


Discover and unlock up to four different endings depending on your choices!


Create your own scene with your favorite girls and costumes and take a picture to save on your device!
